description: Manifest defining which tests are included in the core-battery bundle
notes: This manifest explicitly defines which tests are included in core-battery.
Can be used with either battery/ or upload-battery/ directory.
exclude_patterns removes development files, data, thumbnails, etc.
excluded_tests lists tests that should never be in core (e.g., variants, large tests)
Add new tests to the 'tests' array to include them in core-battery.
With proper excludes, upload-battery/ becomes unnecessary - can build directly from battery/
